entry.title: Earthquake in Afghanistan Kills at Least 1,000
entry.content: The Taliban asked foreign-aid agencies for help for the country, which is already reeling from humanitarian disaster.

entry.title: Russia Hits Grain Terminals in Latest Attack on Ukraine's Food Infrastructure
entry.content: Russian forces targeted at least two large North American-owned grain terminals in the port of Mykolaiv, as part of what Kyiv and Western governments say is a campaign to degrade Ukraine’s ability to export food.

entry.title: How Singapore Got Its Manufacturing Mojo Back
entry.content: The city-state courted high-tech production to become a rare wealthy country to reverse its factory downturn, but that has come by automating away many jobs. “It’s skills-intensive, it’s not labor-intensive.”
